The claim was published by the Christian: which is known to publish content that is not necessarily grounded in fact.
The claim stated that representatives fr: DOD, and Department of Homeland Security held a joint press conference to announce the cancellation of 4th of July fireworks due to terror fears.
The claim quoted Terrance Lively: a counter-terrorism expert with the DHS, who supposedly stated that the cancellation was necessary to reduce potential attack scenarios.
The authenticity of the claim was debunk: which revealed that cities across the country were still hosting such events for the holiday.
